tool_description: FREE Dictionary Translation API Hablaa. Use it to translate words from and into more than 160 languages. The API use is free and requires no authentication. Have fun!
name: Dictionary Translation Hablaa
title: Dictionary Translation Hablaa

api_list.name: Get available languages
api_list.description: Get a list of available languages.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hablaa-dictionary-translation-hablaa-v1.p.rapidapi.com/languages/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hablaa-dictionary-translation-hablaa-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hablaa-dictionary-translation-hablaa-v1.p.rapidapi.com/languages/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hablaa-dictionary-translation-hablaa-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get a translation
api_list.description: Get a translation by defining source and destination languages as well as a word to translate.

api_list.name: Example sentences
api_list.description: Request multiple example sentences containing the word to translate.
